nodes.bodyText: Is it necessary to set them both to 0? My naive understanding of this suggests that if timeout is 0 it does not matter what the multiplier is, because it will be multiplied by 0, so the total result will always be 0 anyways (well, unless the multiplier is infinity, but it is not practically possible).
It was more of an aesthetic thing - if the timeout was 0, make the multiplier 0 too. I will revert this and have it just default to 1 regardless.

nodes.bodyText:
"all this" being the gapic config? Or the license header stuff?
I converted the config to gapic v2, so I removed extraneous config, and parts of the license header config are unsupported in gapic v2 so I removed the entire thing. Most gapic v2 configs don't have them anways.
